plot: Experience the weekly challenges of Sevenly, a socially minded e-commerce company who runs a different campaign each week to raise funding and awareness for deserving charities who are changing the world.
title: Seven Days of Change
plot_es: Experience the weekly challenges of Sevenly, a socially minded e-commerce company who runs a different campaign each week to raise funding and awareness for deserving charities who are changing the world.
plot_en: Experience the weekly challenges of Sevenly, a socially minded e-commerce company who runs a different campaign each week to raise funding and awareness for deserving charities who are changing the world.
